p: The immunofluorescence assay of PKM2 and LDHA further confirmed that the EECP administration suppressed the protein expression of PKM2 and LDHA in MDA-MB-231 cells stimulated with LPS. The fluorescence intensities of PKM2 and LDHA evidently decreased in EECP treatment groups compared with the LPS group ( ∗ P < 0.05, ∗∗ P < 0.01; Figures 5(f)– 5(h)).
